pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h3",null,{"id":"windowsmacos-用户","children":"Windows/macOS 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"通过以下链接打开下载页面，选择所需的版本，下载独立安装包。"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"debianubuntu-用户","children":"Debian/Ubuntu 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"首先请安装依赖："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}apt-get update && {{sudo}}apt-get install -y wget apt-transport-https","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"然后信任 GPG 公钥："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"wget -O - https://packages.adoptium.net/artifactory/api/gpg/key/public | {{sudo}}tee /etc/apt/keyrings/adoptium.asc","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"随后执行以下命令来添加 apt 存储库："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"echo "deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/adoptium.asc] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/deb $(awk -F= '/^VERSION_CODENAME/{print$2}' /etc/os-release) main" | {{sudo}}tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/adoptium.list","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"再执行"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}apt-get update","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["之后可以使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"apt-get install temurin-<version>-jdk"}]," 安装软件包，例如 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"temurin-17-jdk"}]," 和 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"temurin-8-jdk"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"centosrhelfedora-用户","children":"CentOS/RHEL/Fedora 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"执行以下命令来添加 rpm 存储库："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/yum.repos.d/adoptium.repo","code":"[Adoptium]
name=Adoptium
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/rpm/centos$releasever-$basearch/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://packages.adoptium.net/artifactory/api/gpg/key/public","codeLanguage":"ini"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"再执行"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}yum makecache","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["之后可以使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"yum install temurin-<version>-jdk"}]," 安装软件包，例如 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"temurin-17-jdk"}]," 和 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"temurin-8-jdk"}],"。"]}]]}]

meta.title: Adoptium 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
